name: o-phenylene diamine production | o-phenylene diamine | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12047/documentation

This dataset represents the production of o-phenylenediamine from hydrogenation of 2-nitroaniline. Most communly used hydrogenation reduction for the family of products is reported to be the Bechamp reduction which involves use of iron and acid as regents. Reaction is assumed to yield 95% of product. This dataset is a estimation partially based on literature for the production of ortho-phenylendiamine. 

with 2-nitroaniline

With production ortho-phenylendiamine. This dataset includes only raw materials. Energy requirements, wastes and emissions have been excluded due to lack of data.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: see technology and generalComments This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
